In England, in the seven days to 28 November, there were 250,214 new confirmed cases (442.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 November, there were 245,423 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 2% (4,791 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 03 December is 8,802,632 (15,566.1 cases per 100,000 population).
